remarks: A homomorphism of rings preserves multiplication.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
rhmmul.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
rhmmul.m $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rhmmul.n $e |- .X. = ( .r ` S ) $.
rhmmul $p |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( F ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) .X. ( F ` B ) ) ) $.
